textBox.richText: Merry Christmas! I had to sign an NDA for my internship with Splatinum. Some of the details I can no longer disclose without consent include: -Who they have sex with -Technology -Coding -Concepts in general -Songs -Sample sources -Costumes -Costume sources -Kinks, fetishes, and fantasies -Familial relationships -Family recipes -Art -Things they say when they are drunk -Crying This is going to be awesome. I will share what I can.
